title: Free Tyler1 Riot.

embed.description: If you enjoyed, please be sure to comment "hehe xd" and like the video.

body:
Dear Riot, 
As a fan of Tyler1, i would love to see you guys unban him. This video is more than enough evidence to prove that he has not only reformed, but be a model player in league of legends. He even recieved a teamwork ribbon, and those are almost impossible to get. What does the rest of the community think about this. Feedback in comments below. 
Thanks!

replies.body:
i would be all for it.

Except the fact that tyler1 earned his infinite ban. He Worked long and hard for his ability to not be allowed to play anymore. I think we shouldn't spit at his fine achievement and never let him play again.
Infinite bans mean nothing. You could always proxy your IP. xD
they mean something for content creators, proxy your ip all you want, if you post videos of you playing online you will get the account in question ruthlessly banned again.
Teamwork ribbons are like the easiest ribbon to get as long as you give your teammates a win.  We don't need this player that falls SHORT of standards.

We also don't need players who blindly make comments without the information of how much a person has reformed. You are looking entirely on someone's past rather than who they are now. It is easy to tell you are the kind of person to hold grudges and not forgive others, which is one of the worst type of people in the world today. Please do research before posting an ignorant comment such as that, even if team work ribbons might be easy to get, Tyler1 is still reformed.
Reformed? Cool. But that doesn't mean that his previous behavior counts for nothing. He already made his choices, even if he regrets it and is trying harder now.

> [{quoted}](name=GaleWinUnleashed,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=67wigde4,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-09-14T14:04:25.589+0000)
>
> Reformed? Cool. But that doesn't mean that his previous behavior counts for nothing. He already made his choices, even if he regrets it and is trying harder now.

who cares? everyone who gets perm bans just makes new accounts anyway. just let him stream I got perm banned 5 tims.

Surely you get frustrated by the grind back to 30 and having to unlock everything again, right? For some, that's enough to put them off the game entirely, and take their behavior elsewhere. Obviously it didn't affect you or tyler1, but it does remove *some* of the less desirable players from the game.
Yeah but he paid for it with his main account.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaoticGodsLOL,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=67wigde4,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-09-14T13:49:52.069+0000)
>
> We also don't need players who blindly make comments without the information of how much a person has reformed. You are looking entirely on someone's past rather than who they are now. It is easy to tell you are the kind of person to hold grudges and not forgive others, which is one of the worst type of people in the world today. Please do research before posting an ignorant comment such as that, even if team work ribbons might be easy to get, Tyler1 is still reformed.

Just because he wasn't toxic in one game that he recorded doesn't mean that he is reformed.  Not to say that he couldn't be reformed, but one game is not proof.  If he truely wants to get unbanned, then he should work with Riot support, like Incarnation did.  He won't get his accounts back, but he might be able to play again, which basically means he can stream again.

lol do you watched every single game, he played?
Or just this one?
If you only watched this one, how the fuck you can know "how much" he reformed?
Sounds like you're the boosted animal that's unforgiving of Riot banning the ever living crap out of Tyler1's accounts.
He is reformed
Little too late now.

his stream is hilariously entertaining. is he toxic? yeah. what gamer isn't. as long as he doesn't int or troll in his games, he should be good to go imo. flaming teammates happens all the time. if you wanna ban him for being toxic, just get rid of 95% of the league community and have fun managing a game with 100 well-mannered kids with no social skills.

> [{quoted}](name=Irene Fanboy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=67wigde4,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-09-14T14:15:31.528+0000)
>
> his stream is hilariously entertaining. is he toxic? yeah. what gamer isn't. as long as he doesn't int or troll in his games, he should be good to go imo. flaming teammates happens all the time. if you wanna ban him for being toxic, just get rid of 95% of the league community and have fun managing a game with 100 well-mannered kids with no social skills.

You do realize one of the reason for his bans was because he was intentionally feeding. I mean he would go mid and feed all because he had a support that in his mind was trash. So he does do other things than being toxic which resulted in him getting permaban.

1) How is he never bored of playing the same champion over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over  & over & over again......

2) He's suppose to be banned on sight, which I've no idea why it never happens until the point he reached Level 30......
Because he doesn't stream every game he may play. And leveling is a lot faster now, and draven is also only 4800 IP now.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=67wigde4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-14T13:50:10.436+0000)
>
> 1) How is he never bored of playing the same champion over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over & over  & over & over again......
> 
> 2) He's suppose to be banned on sight, which I've no idea why it never happens until the point he reached Level 30......

He buys accounts already leveled?
And remind me why are the fanboys still reviewing him to be "reformed" again?
They aren't that smart.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=67wigde4,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-14T15:02:42.415+0000)
>
> They aren't that smart.

Aside from that they want to see him play live he's fun to watch
You mean the time when he will literally just intentionally feeds when he gets triggered by even the smallest things? I doubt he will still seem to be "fun" if he were ever in any of their games....
Have you watched any of his league of legends gameplay recently or any of his other streams? Another response based off sheeple mind set.
Because he grinds off camera or possibly buys accounts before showing a match, rinse & repeat

Did he truly reform if so I don't see why not :3, stop him from getting accounts from his fans and trolling others for the lulz?

If he truly reformed give him a chance if not keep banning accounts after he does something toxic :3.

Let him play again. As a player that came from the most toxic game of all, Eve Online, Tyler isn't that bad. He's not talking about bestiality or necrophilia. He's calling people out in an abrupt and abrasive way. The only reason that rubs people wrong is LoL has a much younger age base that plays it compared to Eve. Young people don't like the truth even if it's sugar coated. Why would they like Tyler1 with that being the case? Besides. They're going to hate him like their parents. Squeakers suck. Bring Tyler1 back.
He made his bed. Lie in it.
I wanna see the god again streaming and seeing his God Tier {{champion:119}}
yeah unban him. the other streamers are boring and don't do anything fun unless you are a girl streamer like kacytron with your tits hanging out
